FuncDef: When this command is enabled, packets received on a SAP, a spoke-SDP, or a static VXLAN instance with an unknown source MAC address, are dropped if the maximum number of MAC addresses is reached for that SAP, spoke-SDP or VXLAN instance (seemax-nbr-mac-addr). However, if themax-nbr-mac-addrcommand is not set for the SAP or spoke-SDP, or VXLAN instance, then enablingdiscard-unknown-sourcehas no effect.
